definition: suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress

sentences.english: I'm going straight home after the play. What about you?
sentences.chinese: 看完戏我就回家，你打算怎么着？

sentences.english: Haley Starshine :What was I going to do, take a percentage of their dirt?
sentences.chinese: 我能怎么着，从他们的土里拿提成？

sentences.english: Well it seems that some people are into glitter and diamonds and guess what?
sentences.chinese: 似乎有些人很喜欢闪粉和钻石，你猜怎么着？

sentences.english: And if his army of gamers yields a few savants?
sentences.chinese: 那如果他的游戏玩家队伍中产生了几个专家怎么着呢？

sentences.english: What do you think? Old Joe's been sacked!
sentences.chinese: 你猜怎么着？老乔被解雇了。

sentences.english: I believe PG can beat CJ anyway.
sentences.chinese: 我相信该得怎么着也能击败陈金。

sentences.english: Why, so you can stick it full of swords or something?
sentences.chinese: 怎么着，然后你就可以满满地插上剑什么的？

sentences.english: I said, no way cos you need at least two.
sentences.chinese: 我说，那怎么行，你怎么着也得吃两个吧。

sentences.english: And if you believe you’ll never be rich, guess what?
sentences.chinese: 如果你认为你永远不会变得腰缠万贯，你猜怎么着？

sentences.english: Han Jia, no matter how many, you have to choose one as we have to learn.
sentences.chinese: 韩佳，再怎么着总得挑一个，咱们还得学呢。

sentences.english: And the next day, what do you know? A typhoon hit.
sentences.chinese: 结果第二天，你猜怎么着？居然刮台风了。

sentences.english: What if I was tell you I think you're just stalling?
sentences.chinese: 要是我觉得说你是在拖时间怎么着？

definition: dialectal equivalent of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]
good and bad/most unfortunate occurrence/in any case/whatever
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
erhua variant of 哥們|哥们[ge1 men5]
my old mother/I, this old woman/my old lady (colloquial)/maternal grandmother/midwife
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
let it be/let it pass/forget about it
to chant/see 梵唄|梵呗[fan4 bai4]
modal particle indicating indicating lack of enthusiasm/modal particle indicating that things should only or can only be done a certain way
